resources.string: Read only access for the account
To activate your account please enter your email address, activation code or scan a valid QR code.
Position the camera until your face has been detected. The white corners will turn green.
Please enter your new pin code.
Your QR code was processed successfully. You will be registered after our 3 minutes setup process.
Please wait while we verify your face.
Hold the phone in front of you and turn your head left and right as shown in the animation above.
How to turn the face around
We weren\'t able to recognise your face. Check your lighting conditions and try again.
If you fail to authenticate your Face now, the service will be blocked!
If you fail to enter the right Password, the service will be blocked!
If you fail to enter the right Pin, the service will be blocked!
The password you entered appears to be incorrect. Please try again.
The number you entered appears to be incorrect. Please try again.
You can now choose to authenticate with one of the next means of authentication to access this application.
Please wait while we verify your password.
Please wait while we verify your pin.
Hold the camera in front of your face
Please wait while we verify your face.
Keep your phone in front of your face.\nWe don\'t need to see your nostrils.
Make sure that you are in a well lit place, and that the light source is NOT behind you.
Make sure there\'s only you in the frame of the photo.
We will take 3 photos of your face.\nMake sure to:
Hold the phone at face level
Your Password should be at least 4 characters including numbers and letters, no space and maximum 16 characters.
Please confirm your Password by entering it for the second time.
You will have to enter a password.\nMake sure to:
It must contains letters and numbers
It has a maximum length of 16 characters
Please wait while we enrol your PASSWORD
You will have to enter a password.\nMake sure to:
It must contains letters and numbers
It has a maximum length of 16 characters
Your PIN must be between 4 and 10 numbers
Please confirm your PIN by entering it for the second time.
You will have to enter a pin.\nMake sure to:
It has a maximum length of 10 numbers
Please wait while we enrol your PIN
You have successfully completed the setup process!
We had a problem connecting to our servers. Please check your mobile connection, join a WiFi network and try again.
to our servers. Please check your connection and try again.
We had a problem delivering your
Your device does not support minimum required configuration to allow this service. Please consult service provider website for more information.
Localisation is required for security reason to check unusual use of your device.\nBy denying Localisation the service won\'t be able to verify
This app requires your location for security reasons.
Your identifier and activation code are printed under the QR code image
To access your APP account you need to authenticate with your face
Let\'s test the registration by verifying your face once. After you\'re ready turn your face left.
You can now choose to register one of the next means of authentication for further authentication use.
Check your lighting conditions, and look directly to the camera.
The password you reentered differs from the one you first entered. Please try again to create a new password.
The PIN you reentered differs from the one you first entered. Please try again to create a new PIN.
You can add your face now if you wish.
You can add a password now if you wish.
You can add a pin now if you wish.
Please wait while we finish your registration
Scan the QR Code to proceed
To start registration you will need
Your face verification has failed, please restart face registration process
You must accept the legal agreement.
There was an error with the authentication process.
Are you sure that you want to cancel?
Are you sure you want to cancel this transaction?
Your device is not eligible for this service
There was an error during the activation process. Please check your credentials and the network connectivity
Are you sure you want to exit?
There was an error linking the device.
Are you sure that you want to logout?
Verification failure count (liveness) exceeded max number of retries
Verification failure count (matching and liveness) exceeded max number of retries
There was an error with the network.
Passwords are required and must be equal
Pins must contain between 4 and 10 characters and match
Are you sure that you want to remove the account?
Are you sure you want to remove this authentication method?
The server is not available, please try again in a few minutes.
Unlink this device from your account?
There was an error updating the device.
Not a valid URL, please check the syntax
